protocol.name: P-GSE36943-1
text: ABS_CALL = the call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)
DETECTION P-VALUE = p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.name: P-GSE36943-2
protocol.text: Seedlings of rescued emf2 and transWT were grown on plates with 20 mg/mL hygromycin, while those of WT and emf2 were grown on MS-only plates, under short day conditions (8h/16h) for 7 days.

protocol.name: P-GSE36943-3
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown on 0.8% agar plates with half-strength MS and 1.5% sucrose under short day conditions (8h light/ 16h dark) at 21 degrees Celsius.

protocol.name: P-GSE36943-4
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE36943-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 701021 Rev. 5, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE36943-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16.5 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Arrays. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE36943-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.

protocol.name: P-GSE36943-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as the normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 500.
